reviews.review: It is short, but to the people who played Half-Life 2, it's worth playing. It is certainly cheaper than the original game, but i reccomend this to anyone who wants to continue along the Half-Life 2 trilogy.

This game came out 15 years ago. 

Now go clap some cheeks with a goth girl.

esta muy bueno, tiene una duracion que se puede hacer algo corta para algunos pero lo compensa con momentos epicos como la entrada en la ciudadela o la parte en que nos abrimos paso a traves del hospital del terror, una banda sonora que esta al nivel de las 2 anteriores entregas
It helps continue the story of Half Life 2

Half life 2 is widley regarded as one of the greatest videogames of all time, and I can say it lives up to that. This is just an extension of that, its super short, but it's a must play along with the entire half life/portal series. Buy and play black mesa, then buy the orange box so you get HL2 and its episodes. It's obviously very short (took me 2 and a half hours but I beat things quick), but that doesnt mean it has any less value, considering the orange box goes on sale for like 6 bucks with 8 games in it.

Es uno de los mejores juegos que te mete mucho en la historia si lo vas jugando y te lo toma enserio, claramente parece que estas viviendo la tragedia del mundo de verdad. porque este juego esta tan bien hecho en lo que es su ambiente despues las calles vacias y el ambiente de guerra despues de causar mucho caos por el mundo madre mia. por eso este juego es de mis favoritos y para ser tambien un fanatico al half life. realmente si recomiendo jugar la saga desde black mesa el remake del 1 hasta half life 2 con sus episodios. y por cierto un buen clasico tambien.
not enoguh zombe in parking lot :(

Half life 2 episode 1 is the sequel episode to Half life 2 and set after the events of the previous game. The game takes Gordon and Alyx on a mission to escape the city, during the mission they find some intel that needs to be brought to Eli and Kleiner, so they can find out what the combine are up to after the devastating events of half life 2.

Pro's
-Excellent Voice Acting
-Excellent Sound Design
-Excellent Visuals
-Challenging Enemies
-Amazing atmosphere 

Cons
-Some minor glitches
-AI that can get in the way
-Being depended on Alyx tend to slow the game down 

On a last note this game is the shortest of the bunch in term of chapters but tends to be slown down by Alyx and the final escort mission. Even Alyx remarks "This was easy we should've brought everyone at the same time" before having to go back multiple times feeling like the game gets stretched out even more without any reason. 

Still I do recommend the game for the fun gunplay and the narrative it's telling.
Moins bien que l'origine mais super quand m√™me
Amazing, especially if you can get it on sale!

This picks up right where the base game leaves off, and the story is pretty interesting.  You're with Alyx most of the game, and since I think she's great, I was glad about that, especially since she seems a bit more durable than before.  This is on the shorter side, and has some new gimmicks; some are great, and some are not, but overall, I think it's right on par with the base game, so it's a great continuation.

If you liked Half Life 2, then you'll probably like this as well. It's basically a continuation of the story, picking up where HL2 left off. Not much else to say other than it's the usual smooth gameplay and action you'd expect from a Half Life game. I'd say it's about 4-5 hours long. I've put a link to my play-through on Youtube below, if anyone wants to see a sample of gameplay before buying:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ie8XZxObiJM&list=PL05Yc3_TEBpMMAh8PK6RTVgrdR3Fdpa6c

A fitting sequel to a great game!
Finally got to play this after 16 years. Classic

This is required playing if you love Half Life! It actually raps up the ending to Half life 2 without stringing you along which is always a good thing. Its just long enough to not feel short and there's enough story that i definitely feel like a got my moneys worth with this one. The Gun-play carries over from Half life 2 and still is amazing and it seems they fixed a lot of the clipping issues I was having with the original. So all in all this games deserves the attention it got and still gets every day by the gaming community that loves and cherishes it.
